mapper.select: SELECT stb.STCD, ( CASE stb.STTP WHEN 'PP' THEN '雨量站' WHEN 'RR' THEN '水库' WHEN 'ZQ' THEN '水文站' WHEN 'ZZ' THEN '水位站' WHEN 'ZB' THEN '分洪道' ELSE '其他' END ) AS '类型', stb.STNM AS '对象名称', stb.STCD AS '备注' FROM st_stbprp_b stb WHERE stb.ADDVCD LIKE '42%' AND stb.STTP IN ( 'PP', 'RR', 'ZQ', 'ZZ', 'ZB' ) -- AND stb.STNM IN ('杨家湾','永兴') ORDER BY stb.STTP, stb.STCD ;
